frontMatter.title: Digital Marketing Blueprint
frontMatter.metaDescription: A consolidated marketing plan including market segments, key messages, channels, lead capture, nurture, convert, up sale, referrals.

checklist.question: Do you have a digital marketing strategy?
checklist.expectation: You should have a digital marketing strategy because it allows you to reach a global marketplace from anywhere in the world.

checklist.question: Have you identified the customer personas for the digital marketing strategy?
checklist.expectation: Define quantitative demographics and qualitative information, and create a detailed profile for each of your personas

checklist.question: What are your digital marketing channels?
checklist.expectation: Gather what you have, and categorize each of your channels, so you have a clear picture of your existing owned, earned, and paid media.
